EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Web Services Test Automation 101 - 2014.12.11.Email - 2nd Follow Up -
EmailTemplate.subject: Q&A From Web Services Test Automation 101 Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: Web Services Test Automation 101
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Thank you again for attending Tricentis’ Web Services Test Automation 101 Webinar last week! We received so many questions during the webinar wanted to make sure everyone received a thorough and helpful answer. In this email you will find a PDF <http://innovate.tricentis.com/rs/tricentis/images/Webservices_Automation_Webiner_QA.pdf> containing all of the questions from the webinar with detailed answers, as well as a Tosca subset <http://innovate.tricentis.com/rs/tricentis/images/wse_webinar_subset.tce> used during the demo.
Thank you again for your lively participation, that is what makes these webinars such a success!
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
Georg Thurner Product Manager Tricentis
